channel.title: CVE Feed for jeangalea -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for jeangalea -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6621|2024-08-01T21:41:04.059Z -- jeangalea -- rss%20aggregator%20%E2%80%93%20rss%20import%2C%20news%20feeds%2C%20feed%20to%20post%2C%20and%20autoblogging
item.description: The RSS Aggregator – RSS Import, News Feeds, Feed to Post, and Autoblogging plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'wprss_activate_feed_source' and 'wprss_pause_feed_source' functions in all versions up to, and including, 4.23.11. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to activate or pause existing RSS feeds.

item.title: CVE-2024-6621|2024-07-26T18:14:45.135Z -- jeangalea -- rss%20aggregator%20%E2%80%93%20rss%20import%2C%20news%20feeds%2C%20feed%20to%20post%2C%20and%20autoblogging
item.description: The RSS Aggregator – RSS Import, News Feeds, Feed to Post, and Autoblogging plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'wprss_activate_feed_source' and 'wprss_pause_feed_source' functions in all versions up to, and including, 4.23.11. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to activate or pause existing RSS feeds.

item.title: CVE-2024-0630|2024-06-27T21:00:34.225Z -- jeangalea -- wp%20rss%20aggregator%20%E2%80%93%20rss%20import%2C%20news%20feeds%2C%20feed%20to%20post%2C%20and%20autoblogging
item.description: The WP RSS Aggregator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the RSS feed source in all versions up to, and including, 4.23.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level access, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. This only affects multi-site installations and installations where unfiltered_html has been disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-0630|2024-02-05T21:21:53.514Z -- jeangalea -- wp%20rss%20aggregator%20%E2%80%93%20rss%20import%2C%20news%20feeds%2C%20feed%20to%20post%2C%20and%20autoblogging
item.description: The WP RSS Aggregator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the RSS feed source in all versions up to, and including, 4.23.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level access, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. This only affects multi-site installations and installations where unfiltered_html has been disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-0628|2024-02-07T06:46:56.404Z -- jeangalea -- wp%20rss%20aggregator%20%E2%80%93%20rss%20import%2C%20news%20feeds%2C%20feed%20to%20post%2C%20and%20autoblogging
item.description: The WP RSS Aggregator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 4.23.5 via the RSS feed source in admin settings. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level access and above, to make web requests to arbitrary locations originating from the web application and can be used to query and modify information from internal services.

item.title: CVE-2024-6621|2024-07-16T11:00:58.101Z -- jeangalea -- rss%20aggregator%20%E2%80%93%20rss%20import%2C%20news%20feeds%2C%20feed%20to%20post%2C%20and%20autoblogging

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to activate or pause existing RSS feeds.
